mean_en: the force that attracts objects in space towards each other, and that on the earth pulls them towards the centre of the planet, so that things fall to the ground when they are dropped
sentence: An apple fell on his head because of gravity.
sentence_trans: 苹果因为重力砸到了他的头上。
word_etyma: grav重 + ity名词后缀 → gravity庄重；地心吸力
